title: The Carpet area of residential/non-residential premises may be altered with the consent of occupants
clause_text: The Carpet area of residential/non-residential premises may be altered with the consent of occupants.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
